description:
Aya and Tsuyuno are sent to the hospital unconscious after their deadly battle with Sarina. Meanwhile, Nijimi visits the Asagiri household and meets Kaname after she learns of Aya`s betrayal. That night, a girl appears before the still unconscious Rina. She is Kosame Amagai and she possesses a magic stick with healing powers. Kosame uses her power to wake Rina, and Rina learns an unexpected truth.
Source: Amazon
